history.proof: intros x y eps. unfold continuity_2d_pt, locally_2d. specialize (pos eps). sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference eps_pos was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x y eps. unfold continuity_2d_pt, locally_2d. intros eps_pos. specialize (eps_pos eps). unfold ball in eps_pos. rewrite R_dist in eps_pos. apply eps_pos.
